title: Executive Order 5456-Power-Site Restoration No. 449, Blacksmith Fork, Utah
content: So much of the order of July 26, 1913, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 393, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 10 N., R. 1 E., sec. 12, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 10 N., R. 2 E., sec. 1, N. ½ of SW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5456-Power-Site Restoration No. 449, Blacksmith Fork, Utah Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373042
